# HMError.Code.deviceLocked

**Case**

An error indicating the device is locked.

## Declaration

```swift
case deviceLocked
```

## Device and discovery errors

- **HMError.Code.accessoryDiscoveryFailed**: An error indicating accessory discovery failed.
